MemberSignature.Value: public static long Read (Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeFileHandle handle, System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList<Memory<byte>> buffers, long fileOffset);

.method public static hidebysig int64 Read(class Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeFileHandle handle, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList`1<valuetype System.Memory`1<unsigned int8>> buffers, int64 fileOffset) cil managed
Public Shared Function Read (handle As SafeFileHandle, buffers As IReadOnlyList(Of Memory(Of Byte)), fileOffset As Long) As Long
static member Read : Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeFileHandle * System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList<Memory<byte>> * int64 -> int64
public: static long Read(Microsoft::Win32::SafeHandles::SafeFileHandle ^ handle, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyList<Memory<System::Byte>> ^ buffers, long fileOffset);

Docs.param: The file handle.
A list of memory buffers. When this method returns, the contents of the buffers are replaced by the bytes read from the file.
The file position to read from.
Docs.summary: Reads a sequence of bytes from given file at given offset.
Docs.returns: The total number of bytes read into the buffers. This can be less than the number of bytes allocated in the buffers if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the file has been reached.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
Position of the file is not advanced.

Docs.exception: The file does not support seeking (pipe or socket).
